ingredients: 1 lb raw jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
1/2 cup chopped cilantro, plus more for topping
steps: Combine shrimp with 1 Tbsp olive oil in a bowl. Season with smoked paprika, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Spread on a sheet pan and roast for 10 minutes
While shrimp roasts, prepare slaw by mixing cabbage, cilantro, lime juice, remaining 1 Tbsp olive oil, salt, and pepper
Add corn to the pan with shrimp. Roast another 5-6 minutes
Serve on tortillas topped with slaw, pickled onions, shrimp, corn, and cotija cheese
title: Roasted Shrimp Tacos
